casebody.data:
STATE of Connecticut
v.
Anthony CARTER Supreme Court of Connecticut. Decided November 15, 2017 Anthony Carter, self-represented, in support of the petition. Timothy F. Costello, assistant state's attorney, in opposition.

The defendant's petition for certification to appeal from the Appellate Court, 174 Conn.App. 749 , 166 A.3d 910 (2017), is denied.

KAHN, J., did not participate in the consideration of or decision on this petition.
